src/semigroup.ls

The concat method

A value which has a Semigroup must provide a concat method. The concat method takes one argument:

s.concat(b)
  1. b must be a value of the same Semigroup. i. if b is not of the same Semigroup, behaviour of concat is unspecified.
  2. concat must return a value of the same Semigroup.

1st Law: Associativity

a.concat(b).concat(c) is equivalent to a.concat(b.concat(c)).

export associativity = (f) -> for-all(Int, Int, Int).satisfy (a, b, c) -> x = (f a).concat(f b).concat(f c) y = (f a).concat((f b).concat(f c)) x.is-equal y
